info.title: Voucherify API
info.description: Voucherify promotion engine REST API. Please see https://docs.voucherify.io/docs for more details.

get.description:
This method enables you to list promotion stacks irrespective of the campaign they are associated with. You can use filters in the query parameters to specify the stacks to be returned in the response. ## Advanced filters for fetching promotion stacks | **Filters** | **Examples** | | :--- | :--- | | Created Before | - `[created_at][before]=2021-12-30T13:52:18.227Z`
- `[filters][created_at][conditions][$before][0]=2021-12-30T13:52:18.227Z` | | Created After | - `[created_at][after]=2021-12-30T13:52:18.227Z`
- `[filters][created_at][conditions][$after][0]=2021-12-30T13:52:18.227Z` | | Updated Before | - `[updated_at][before]=2021-12-30T13:52:18.227Z`
- `[filters][updated_at][conditions][$before][0]=2021-12-30T13:52:18.227Z` | | Updated After | - `[updated_at][after]=2021-12-30T13:52:18.227Z`
- `[filters][updated_at][conditions][$after][0]=2021-12-30T13:52:18.227Z` |

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of objects to be returned. The limit can range between 1 and 100 items.
Which page of results to return. The lowest value is `1`.
parameters.name: page
order
parameters.description: Sorts the results using one of the filtering options, where the dash `-` preceding a sorting option means sorting in a descending order.

200.description: Returns a dictionary with a `data` property that contains an array of promotion stacks across all your campaigns.

PromotionsStacksListResponseBody.title: Promotions Stacks List Response Body
PromotionsStacksListResponseBody.description: Response body schema for **GET** `v1/promotions/stacks` and for **GET** `v1/promotions/{campaignId}/stacks`.

object.description: The type of the object represented by JSON. This object stores information about promotion stacks in a dictionary.

data_ref.description: Identifies the name of the attribute that contains the array of promotion stack objects.

data.description: Contains array of promotion stack objects.

before.description: Timestamp representing the date and time before the voucher was created. The value is shown in the ISO 8601 format.

after.description: Timestamp representing the date and time after the voucher was created. The value is shown in the ISO 8601 format.

before.description: Timestamp representing the date and time before the voucher was updated. The value is shown in the ISO 8601 format.

after.description: Timestamp representing the date and time after the voucher was updated. The value is shown in the ISO 8601 format.

created_at.description: Timestamp representing the date and time when the promotion stack was created. The value is shown in the ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.description: Timestamp representing the date and time when the promotion stack was updated. The value is shown in the ISO 8601 format.

campaign_id.description: Promotion stack's parent campaign's unique ID.

object.description: The type of the object represented by JSON.

categories.description: Details about the category assigned to the promotion stack.

tiers.description: Contains the tier configuration. A promotion stack can include up to 30 tiers.

ids.description: Contains the list of tiers in a pre-defined sequence.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: This is an object representing a category.

id.description: Unique category ID assigned by Voucherify.

hierarchy.description: Category hierarchy. Categories with lower hierarchy are processed before categories with higher hierarchy value.

object.description: The type of the object represented by the JSON. This object stores information about the category.

created_at.description: Timestamp representing the date and time when the category was created. The value is shown in the ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.description: Timestamp representing the date and time when the category was updated. The value is shown in the ISO 8601 format.

created_at.name: created_at
created_at.description: A filter on the list based on the object `created_at` field. The value is a dictionary with the following options: `before`, `after`. A date value must be presented in ISO 8601 format (`2016-11-16T14:14:31Z` or `2016-11-16`). An example: `[created_at][before]=2017-09-08T13:52:18.227Z`

updated_at.name: updated_at
updated_at.description: A filter on the list based on the object `updated_at` field. The value is a dictionary with the following options: `before`, `after`. A date value must be presented in ISO 8601 format (`2016-11-16T14:14:31Z` or `2016-11-16`). An example: `[updated_at][before]=2017-09-08T13:52:18.227Z`
